name: part_006
file: tmp_【#はあちゃま3D】はあちゃま、動きます。 [DsV-EJmbvr8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Haachama and Coco interact while posing for screenshots, including a segment involving an 'Uncle' persona and some suggestive poses.
MC section where Haachama explains they are 'Hololive English' and prepares to perform a 'Sexy Dance' version of a song.
A pixel-art animation segment with a recurring song about Haachama, featuring various on-screen texts.
Performance of 'Shiny Smily Story' (English Version) with on-screen lyrics and enthusiastic interjections.
